trigger: Nuclear protein extract and in vitro translation of <extra_id_0> Sox6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
Nuclear extracts were prepared from MEL cells ( 2 x 107 ) using a kit ( Active Motif , Carlsbad , California , United States ) .

The <extra_id_0> Sox6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in vitro translation expression vector , tagged with <extra_id_0> c-Myc <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> HA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , was described before [ 15 ] .
The translation was performed in a reticulocyte lysate based in vitro translational system ( TNT ( R ) Quick Coupled Transcription / Translation Systems , Promega ) .
A vector without the <extra_id_0> Sox6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> coding sequence was also translated as a negative control .
